item.title: WebKit - ITP
item.description: Intelligent Tracking Prevention (ITP) is a privacy feature part of WebKit Tracking Prevention technologies. Itâ€™s a conjunction of several features to prevent a website from tracking a user under a third-party context. Unfortunately, the initial design introduced a new XS-Leak 1, allowing attackers to abuse the states implicitly created by ITP to classify websites as trackers. Root Cause # To classify whether a website had tracking capabilities, ITP collects statistics on resource loads as well as user interactions in websites such as clicks, taps, or text entries.
